title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 50.2 - Application of regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 50.2 - Application of regulations

State Regulations

The regulations adopted by the Board of Commissioners of

Pilots of the State of New York shall be applicable to all pilots licensed by
the board, except in such cases where it appears from the regulation itself
that it is applicable to Sandy Hook pilots only, to Hudson River pilots only, or to Long Island Sound-Block Island Sound pilots only. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
50.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
